participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys family activities and cooking gourmet meals.
participant_1.background: I don't like fast food, but I love a good cup of chai tea. I am a gourmet cook. I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids. My favorite jello is the blue one. I practice yoga daily.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Artistic and driven, balances a day job with a passion for music and dance.
participant_2.background: I like to spend rainy days in my studio, practicing my dance moves. I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job. I'm a software engineer, but my passion is writing. I have a cat named Seven of Nine. My brother thinks he's a Viking.

content.text: Hi, what's up?
Hey there, not much, just practicing my dance moves.
That's cool, I love to dance too! What kind of dancing do you do?
I do a lot of different types of dancing, but I mostly do ballet and contemporary.
That's awesome! I used to do ballet when I was younger, but I haven't danced in a long time.
You should get back into it! It's so much fun.
I think I will, I miss it.
Great! I'm sure you'll be a natural.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
No problem. So, what do you do for fun?
I'm a gourmet cook, and I love to practice yoga.
That's awesome! I love to cook too, but I'm not very good at it.
You should give it a try, it's really fun.
I will, thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. So, what's your favorite kind of food to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes, especially lasagna.
Lasagna is my favorite! I love making it too.
Awesome! We should make lasagna together sometime.
That would be fun!
Great! We can set something up soon.
Sounds good
